articles.title: Professor Albert Kong of Astronomy Institute are honored as 2025 Tsing Hua Chair Professor.
Professor Horng-Tay Jeng of Physics Department are honored as 2025 Distinguished Professor.
Congratulations!!  Prof Yang,Hsiang-Yi Karen Win 2025 Taiwan outstanding women in science
Congratulations!! Win NSF HDR Machine Learning Challenge awards Search unknow Gravity Waves In universe Project – Runer-up Qiwei Li (NTHU PHYS),Jiacheng Pan(NTHU PHYS),Zichen Qiu (NTHU PHYS)
Congratulations! Prof Cheung, Kingman win  2024 outsanding research  awards by NSC
Congratulations! Prof  Hsu,Wei-Ting and Prof Harsono, Daniel  win  2024 New  Staff Research Award
congratulations! Prof Ite A Yu  and Prof Chih-Sung Chuu Win  2024 Future Technology Award
Congratulations! Prof  Chang,Po-Yao won the  2024 Mr. Wu Dayou Memorial Award
Congratulations! Prof  Kuo-An Wu won the  2024 Distinguished Professor
Congratulations!  Prof  We-Fu Chang  win  2024 Teaching Excellence Award.
Congratulations Prof Horng Tay  Jeng winning  the 2024 National Science Outstating  Research Award
Congratulations!  Professor Horng-Tay Jeng is selected as the winner of the 58th Sun Yat-sen Academic Writing Award in the natural science category.
